mapper.select: select count(id) as o_count, count(distinct user_id) as u_count, sum(actual_price) as p_sum, sum(actual_price)/count(distinct user_id) as p_avg, date(add_time) as date from cskaoyan_mall_order group by date(add_time)

select count(distinct temp.order_id) as o_count, sum(number) as n_count, sum(temp.np) as np, date(temp.add_time) as date from (select *, number*price as np from cskaoyan_mall_order_goods) as temp group by date(add_time)
